Stop Drinking - Quit Now Goal Notify when goal is done. Progress Badges Health Savings Settings Settings DD/LL/YYYY
I am ready! I need some more time Set quitting date: Alcoholic beverages consumed daily: Alcoholic beverages in package: Years of drinking: Price per package: Alcohol-free for: Saved this much money: Recovered this much life-expectancy: Avoided this many alcoholic beverages: Whilst drinking, you: Whilst not drinking, you: Drank this many alcoholic beverages: Wasted this much money: Lost this much life-expectancy: Percentage of Goals: set a goal 2 days 3 days 4 days 5 days 6 days 10 days 1 week 2 weeks 3 weeks 1 month 3 months 6 months 1 year 5 years 10 years Accomplished After 6 hours: Early withdrawal symptoms will start to show up. After 12 hours: Headaches, nausea and irritability continue to increase. After 24 hours: Additional symptoms like disorientation, tremors and seizures may arrive. After 48 hours: Hallucinations and panic attacks are common during this time. After 72 hours: You will be at most risk for life-threatening symptoms. After 5 to 10 days: Withdrawal symptoms begin to taper off. After 10 to 14 days: Sleep patterns are likely to improve. After 2 to 12 weeks: Weight loss might occur from the reduced calorie intake. After 3 to 4 weeks: Blood pressure reduces to lower levels. After 1 to 2 months: Your skin starts to look better. After 1 to 12 months: More energy and a general sense of better health are common. After 1 to 5 years: Almost everyone will leave symptoms behind and enjoy the benefits. After ten years: No major improvements but well done!g> Total amount of alcoholic beverages not consumed: Days without drinking any alcoholic beverages: Total regained life-expectancy: Current amount of money: Things you could buy instead of drinking: Buy Bought Save Name the items you want from the saved up money Name of product: Price of product: This is already yours. Not enough money. * Please set a value between 1â€“1000 for all of the prompts! :) * You have reached your set goal(s)!.
